description.en:
The inventions of world renowned scientist Juzo Kabuto are peerless. But Professor Kabuto lives with a heavy heart after his research cost the lives of his grandchildren's parents.  
One ominous day, Juzo Kabuto gives his eldest grandson Kouji a terrifying inheritence - a giant robot known as Mazinger Z, a machine that is the pinnacle of Juzo's legacy. This super weapon is capable of making Kouji Kabuto the most powerful person in history, with the destiny of the world in his hands. Mazinger Z has the potential to become the savior of humanity… or the calamity that ends it. With Mazinger Z, Kouji Kabuto can become God or Devil.   
But when Kouji begins having visions of lives he's never lived, will he be able to keep his grasp on reality long enough to survive what awaits?
description.pt-br:
As invenções do renomado cientista Juzo Kabuto são inigualáveis. Mas o professor Kabuto vive com o coração pesado depois que sua pesquisa custou a vida dos pais de seus netos. Em um dia sinistro, Juzo Kabuto dá a seu neto mais velho, Kouji, uma herança terrível - um robô gigante conhecido como Mazinger Z, uma máquina que é o auge do legado de Juzo. 

Essa super arma é capaz de fazer de Kouji Kabuto a pessoa mais poderosa da história, com o destino do mundo em suas mãos. Mazinger Z tem o potencial de se tornar o salvador da humanidade... ou a calamidade que acaba com ela. Com Mazinger Z, Kouji Kabuto pode se tornar Deus ou Diabo. 

Mas quando Kouji começa a ter visões de vidas que nunca viveu, ele será capaz de manter sua compreensão da realidade por tempo suficiente para sobreviver ao que o espera?

biography.en:
永井豪
Nagai Go
==
Kiyoshi Nagai, better known by the pen name Go Nagai, is a Japanese manga artist and a prolific author of science fiction, fantasy, horror and erotica. He made his professional debut in 1967 with [Meakashi Polikichi](https://mangadex.org/title/65efd7e6-cdd1-4fba-a79e-32134b2cef53/go-nagai-short-stories), but is best known for creating popular 1970s manga and anime series such as [Cutie Honey](https://mangadex.org/title/8b14307b-327d-46aa-8ddd-1184ce1130c3/cutie-honey), [Devilman](https://mangadex.org/title/4393fd4e-d646-4bab-9c95-786168ccb618/devilman) and [Mazinger Z](https://mangadex.org/title/5f5296c6-df3d-4bb0-ae46-f4b1163c89d1/mazinger-z). He is credited with creating the super robot genre and for designing the first mecha robots piloted by a user from within a cockpit with Mazinger Z, and for pioneering the magical girl genre with Cutie Honey, the post-apocalyptic genre with [Violence Jack](https://mangadex.org/title/eaa7e3d4-4f91-4a2e-89b0-afe448dc6b2a/violence-jack), and the ecchi genre with [Harenchi Gakuen](https://mangadex.org/title/4dde1161-3101-4dbb-aaba-ff3a84219cba/shameless-school). In 2005, he became a Character Design professor at the Osaka University of Arts. He has been a member of the Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize's nominating committee since 2009.
